document_data.name: Sono
document_data.mainbody: '''Sono''' was a servant in the town of [[Aru]] in [[Wa]].
document_data.Personality: Sono was totally loyal to his [[daimyo]] but also in love with [[Buntaro Ostato]].
document_data.Activities: Sono was a servant in the house of the daimyo [[Benju Matsutomo]]. She had talent playing the [[samisen]] and often played for Benju's guests.
